ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Trying to edit any field in kanban view causes cursor to move into date field.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm that the bug report does ***not*** already exist - [x] I confirm there is no existing issue for this bug. ### Steps to reproduce 1. Create a DB with entries that have a date field and another text field 2. Create a kanban view with the entries 3. Click on an entry, try to edit the text field 4. Cursor moved into date field any time you try to edit the text field. Makes editing other fields impossible. This started happening today on our hosted instance. Doesn't happen outside kanban view. No changes made to the DB on our end to trigger this. An example row: https://app.nocodb.com/#/wg1e4azi/pkwqh4cac303jrm/mv2ij2k0585c7x5/vw39ve4ky1vr8q2k?rowId=4027 ### Desired Behavior Make the bug go away ### Project Details See link above ### Attachments _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #10391 from nocodb/l10n_develop_2 New Crowdin updates
